Looking for the crack of the 1.06.7719 patch?;

*Just download it somewhere (over the rainbow)
*Apply the patch (1.06.7719)
*Install the 'Deep Ocean' add-on
*Copy over the crack to your installation
*Play using 'RELOADED' and '1' as written everywhere

*You're welcome!
